Job Position: Territory Development Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Owerri, Imo

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Territory Development Executive from a FMCG to join our team.
	In this role, you will be responsible for expanding our market presence, developing new business opportunities, and nurturing relationships with clients and channel partners within your assigned territory.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, develop, and manage new business opportunities in the assigned territory.
	Establish and maintain strong relationships with clients, distributors, and other key stakeholders.
	Execute sales strategies to achieve growth targets and improve market share.
	Conduct market analysis to identify trends, competitor activities, and customer needs.
	Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and product demonstrations.
	Regularly visit customers and potential leads to promote products/services and close deals.
	Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to align strategies and campaigns.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and territory performance.
	Provide feedback from the field to help improve products, services, and customer satisfaction.
	Participate in trade shows, promotional events, and networking opportunities.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
	3-5 years of experience in sales, business development, or territory management (preferred FMCG).
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to meet or exceed sales targets.


Salary
N164,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;TDE-Owerri&quot; as subject title of the mail.",

Finance Executive Job at Emeraldzone Business Support Services




        
    

        
        Emeraldzone Business Support Services (EmeraldBSS), provides Business Advisory, Human Capital Interventions, Marketing Communication, Sales Capability Development and other broad Capacity Building Solutions among others, specific to each client’s peculiar needs, to stand them out in their industry. We focus on Organization, People, Process and Technology to advance our outputs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Executive
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you a young finance professional eager to grow your career in a dynamic organization?
	We’re looking for a Finance Executive who’s passionate about numbers, documentation, and delivering accurate financial reports that drive smart business decisions.


Key Responsibilities


	Support payroll, pension, and tax processes (PAYE, VAT, etc.)
	Maintain proper documentation and assist with audit preparation
	Prepare management, accounting, and cost reports
	Handle reconciliations and expense tracking
	Use Excel to analyze data and support reporting activities


Key Skills


	B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance, Economics, or related field is highly important
	1–2 years of post-NYSC experience in finance/accounting
	Strong Excel skills (pivot tables, formulas, data analysis)
	Attention to detail, integrity, and willingness to learn
	Knowledge of payroll and tax processes is a plus.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@emeraldzone.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Job Openings at Pyfinest Resource
content:
Pyfinest Resource - Our clients in various sectors are recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Tech-Savvy Entry-Level Accountant / Admin

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	A fast-growing confectionery business in Port Harcourt seeks a smart, detail-oriented, and tech-savvy Accountant/Admin to handle bookkeeping, financial records, and administrative tasks efficiently.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage daily bookkeeping and financial record keeping.
	Handle invoicing, expenses, and petty cash reconciliation.
	Maintain accurate data using Microsoft Excel and other accounting tools.
	Support management with reports, costing, and administrative tasks.


Candidate Profile


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related fields
	Hands-on experience in Microsoft Excel (mandatory).
	Proven bookkeeping experience — practical test will be given.
	Strong attention to detail, integrity, and organizational skills.
	Tech-savvy with good communication ability.
	Proximity to Oil Mill/Akpajo/Woji is preferred.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 30th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: pyfinest.hr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only candidates with Strong practical Excel and bookkeeping skills should apply. Others need not apply.

 

2.) Medical Doctor (Experienced Practitioner)

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Conduct patient consultations, diagnosis, and treatment across diverse medical cases.
	Provide evidence-based care and maintain thorough clinical documentation.
	Collaborate with nurses, specialists, and support staff to ensure high-quality care delivery.
	Participate in medical audits, case reviews, and continuing professional development.
	Ensure compliance with hospital policies, medical ethics, and professional standards.


Candidate Requirements


	Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS or MBChB) from a recognized institution.
	Minimum of 3 years of post-NYSC clinical experience in a reputable healthcare facility.
	Must have completed Housemanship and NYSC.
	Must hold a current practicing license and be in good standing with the Medical and Dental Council of Nigeria (MDCN).
	Excellent diagnostic, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Demonstrated commitment to continuous medical learning and patient-centered care.
	The ideal candidate must demonstrate clinical excellence, sound judgment, and strong patient management skills, with the ability to work effectively within a multidisciplinary environment.


What We Offer


	Salary: N350,000 / Month and benefits.
	Access to ongoing professional training and development.
	Opportunity to work with a multidisciplinary team in a structured, modern facility.
	Stable and supportive work environment.


Application Closing Date: 10th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and valid MDCN practicing license to: pyfinest.hr@gmail.com using “Medical Doctor – Port Harcourt” as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted and fully licensed candidates will be contacted.

 

3.) Experienced Accountant (ICAN / ACCA Certified)

Job Location: Obudu, Cross River

Employment Type: Full-time
Slots: 2 Openings

Job Description


	They are seeking experienced, Certified, and detail-driven Accountants to join their finance team.
	This is an exceptional opportunity to work within a refined and structured organization that upholds the highest standards of professionalism, integrity, and service excellence.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage day-to-day accounting operations, reconciliations, and financial reporting.
	Prepare accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
	Oversee budgeting, forecasting, and cost control systems.
	Ensure statutory compliance (taxes, audits, financial regulations).
	Support management with data-driven financial insights for decision-making.


Requirements
Ideal Candidate Profile


	Bachelor’s Degree / HND qualification in Accounting or Finance.
	Minimum 3 years of relevant experience, preferably in the hospitality or service industry.
	ICAN or ACCA certification (mandatory).
	Strong knowledge of Excel & accounting software (QuickBooks, Sage, or Zoho Books).
	Excellent Excel skills and analytical ability.
	High integrity, attention to detail, and ability to work under pressure.


Why Join us


	Work with a renowned luxury hospitality group.
	Competitive salary and attractive benefits.
	Stable and structured work environment with growth potential.


Application Closing Date: 10th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Professional Certifications to: pyfinest.hr@gmail.com using “Experienced Accountant – Calabar” as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted and certified candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Sales Manager / Officer Job at Cola Solar




        
    

        
        Cola Solar is a fast-growing renewable energy company committed to providing reliable and sustainable solar power solutions across Nigeria. Our mission is to empower businesses and households with clean, efficient energy while maintaining operational excellence and customer satisfaction. We are a dynamic and fast-growing company in the Renewable Energy sector, dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional value to our customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager / Officer

Job Locations: Port Harcourt - Rivers, Ikorodu - Lagos, Benin - Edo and Onitsha - Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To support our expansion, we are recruiting Sales Officers who are ambitious, results-driven, and passionate about growth.
	As a Sales Officer, you will play a key role in promoting our products/services, identifying new business opportunities, building customer relationships, and driving revenue.
	This is a performance-based role with a competitivebasic salary plus commission, and it offers multiple opportunities for career advancement within the company.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, prospect, and secure new clients for the company.
	Maintain and grow relationships with existing customers.
	Meet and exceed monthly/quarterly sales targets.
	Conduct presentations, product demonstrations, and client follow-ups.
	Provide timely feedback and market intelligence to management.
	Represent the company with professionalism and integrity at all times.


Requirements


	OND / HND / BSc Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields (preferred but not mandatory).
	Proven experience in sales, marketing, or customer relations within the Energy sector is an advantage (1-3 years for Sales Officers and 3-5 years for Sales Managers).
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and able to work independently.
	Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build trust with clients.
	Must be resident in Choosen location.


What We Offer


	Competitive basic salary + attractive commission structure.
	Multiple career growth and promotion opportunities within the company.
	Ongoing training and professional development.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a short cover letter to: hr@colasolar.com using Application – Sales Officer (PH), Application- Sales Officer (Benin), Application-Sales Manager/ Officer(Lagos-Ikorodu) as the subject of the mail.

Note: This role is ideal for driven individuals who want to earn beyond a fixed salary and grow rapidly within a forward-thinking organization.
